cab.content: Military Secret.5816From Viceroy, Army Department, 29th May 1917.(Received 30th, 9 a.m.)7883. Mahsud operations. Column reached Sarwakai on 26th May,and returned to Tanai 27th May. Concentration of Force and collection ofsupplies at Jandola proceeding. Damage to telegraph line between Wana,Tanai, Sarwakai is reported. Gomal flood has abated.
